Kubernetes on-premises: the why, what and how to implement
item.description: Kubernetes on-premises enables organizations to deploy and manage systems on their own infrastructure, offering benefits like environment standardization, compliance, and cost predictability. This article discusses the reasons for choosing on-premises Kubernetes, including avoiding vendor lock-in and leveraging legacy systems, and provides a guide to setting up a Kubernetes cluster using Talos Linux and Vagrant.
